text: Adrian Frutiger (May 24, 1928 â€“ September 12, 2015) was a Swiss typeface designer. He was known for typing name of cities and towns on road signs. His most famous signs designs include Univers, Frutiger and Avenir. He was born in Unterseen, Switzerland. Frutiger died in Bremgarten bei Bern, Switzerland, aged 87. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Swiss writers Category:Swiss designers Category:People from the canton of Bern Category:20th-century artists
title: Adrian Frutiger
